title: One Stroke Reminder [Wear App]
summary: single stroke of the brush at time when I'd like to notify.
description: The one one drew sets time and is shown to the character and time which was set when a picture was drawn, by a picture drawn with a single stroke of the brush.There are no confidences only by a memory a little, but I think when the thing which isn't also to the extent it's added to the TODO list, is established, it's convenient.* The notice which can be established is only 1.* When an application is opened once again in the state established already, elimination or readjustment can be chosen.
descriptionHTML:
The one one drew sets time and is shown to the character and time which was set when a picture was drawn, by a picture drawn with a single stroke of the brush.

There are no confidences only by a memory a little, but I think when the thing which isn't also to the extent it's added to the TODO list, is established, it's convenient.

* The notice which can be established is only 1.
* When an application is opened once again in the state established already, elimination or readjustment can be chosen.
recentChanges: When designating time which has passed already, it corresponds so that it may be established as time of the next day.
